headline: Mohawk Industries Inc (MHK) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Stability Amid Market Challenges
summary: Despite flat sales and ongoing pricing pressures, Mohawk Industries Inc (MHK) focuses on operational improvements and strategic initiatives to drive future growth.
